result.execSummary:
The defendant Nicole M. Peterson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Manufacture/Deliver THC (<=200g) [Modifiers: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime], a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(1)(h)1.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: The defendant shall pay Department of Correction fees as directed by the agent.  Defendant was ordered to report immediately to the probation and parole office. Case 14CF53, Manufacture/Deliver THC 961.41(1)(h)1 was dismissed and read-in to this case.

miscConds.notes: Defendant is ordered to pay the $250.00 DNA surcharge, provide a sample for testing through the Dept. of Corrections as required in felony convictions.  Bond of $500.00 applied to this case, remaining amount to be paid on a schedule established by the agent.
Defendant shall attend counseling/programing as deemed appropriate by the agent releasing all records to the agent upon request
Six months after the successful completion of probation, and having no further criminal violations of law, the defendant may apply for expungement of these charges.

The defendant is to submit to an Alcohol and Other Drug Assessment (AODA) and follow the recommendations, releasing the findings to the agent.  

The defendant shall submit to random urine/PBT testing without cause as required by the agent or any law enforcement agent. .

timeConds.notes: Defendant granted credit for 1 day served and Huber priveleges and is to report on or before 6-18-2014 at 7:30pm
Defendant is to arrange for community service with the approval of the agent.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea
